FuncDef:
This command sets the priority value to become the rendezvous point (RP) that is included in bootstrap messages sent by the router. The RP is sometimes called the bootstrap router. 
Theprioritycommand indicates whether the router is eligible to be a bootstrap router.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the priority to become the designated router. The higher the value, the higher the priority. Values-1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: Default: priority 1 (The router is the least likely to become the designated router.)
